body_html: @yaroslavvb @wjaskowski +1 regarding the fact that one can't dismiss poor performance for small models just because no one cares about MNIST and CIFAR-10 (and their corresponding small convnets) anymore. The state-of-the-art RL models are rather small and so the importance of adequate performance for small models is still an issue to address for current research and production use cases.
